name: Broke'n'Bad
description:
Game Description

You are broke ... Luckily Uncle Walt will happily lend you some money to get your business back up ... for his fair share obviously ...  oh ... and ... don't attract law enforcement ... Get rich! Good luck!

Controls

  • W, A, S, D to move the camera
  • Escape to pause the game and deselect building option
  • In-game buttons are hot-keyed from 1 to 8
